story_11_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
But I still had a lot of fun!
I’m glad I got the chance to compete.
story_11_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I was so focused on the battle that I
forgot to feel nervous at all!
story_11_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You were awesome, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I think I got goose bumps... How about you, Hau?
story_11_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Yeah, they were really strong. But...
story_11_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Gaaah, we were so close! And we tried
so hard, too. Guess I’ve gotta get even stronger!
story_11_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Yeah... Or, wait a sec! I have an idea!
Why don’t you ask [Name:PlayerNickname ] if
you can join [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] team?
story_11_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
You can keep battling if you join their team,
and you can keep getting stronger, like you said!
story_11_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Yeah... Yeah, you’re right!
Wow, Sophocles, you really are a genius!
story_11_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m joining your
team, OK? Let’s do our best together!
story_11_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I think I’ll just observe for a while.
I want to do an in-depth study of the
way various teams battle together...
story_11_02000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I think it could be really useful for
my inventions!
story_11_02000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Yeah? Then from here on out, let’s enjoy the
tournament our own way!
story_11_02000/2401_1001_2200_10:
All right, then! Let’s do this!
We’re gonna have so much fun!
